mapper.update:
update order_info
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
service_price = #{servicePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_discount = #{totalDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_service = #{isService,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
follow = #{follow,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliver_time = #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_receive_time = #{shopReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shop_finish_time = #{shopFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
express_id = #{expressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
express_receive_time = #{expressReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
express_finish_time = #{expressFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reward = #{reward,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
receive_address_id = #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deliver_address_id = #{deliverAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
single_service_type = #{singleServiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_info set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, service_price = #{servicePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_discount = #{totalDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_service = #{isService,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, follow = #{follow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_time = #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_receive_time = #{shopReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shop_finish_time = #{shopFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, express_id = #{expressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, express_receive_time = #{expressReceiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, express_finish_time = #{expressFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reward = #{reward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, receive_address_id = #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliver_address_id = #{deliverAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, single_service_type = #{singleServiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from order_info where user_id = #{userId} and order_status in (${type})
select count(1) from order_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and status = 4
select count(1) from order_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and status = 4 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shop_finish_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(deliver_time)
